addPool(address,address).notice: Add a new pool for rewards distribution

claimAllRewards(address).notice: Claim all available rewards for a pool

claimFTSORewards(address,uint256[]).notice: Claim FTSO rewards for a pool

removePool(address).notice: Remove a pool from rewards distribution
